title: Wild mushroom stuffing
ingredients: ['500ml hot water', '30g dried porcini mushrooms', '800g bread - crust trimmed, and cut into 2cm cubes', '125g chopped hazelnuts', '85g unsalted butter', '3 leeks, coarsely chopped', '150g chopped shallots', '500g crimini mushrooms, sliced', '250g shiitake mushrooms, sliced', '60g chopped celery', '60g chopped fresh parsley', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh sage', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '180ml vegetable stock']
